data.quote: No real change in history has ever been achieved by discussions.
data.author: Subhas Chandra Bose

data.quote: Some goals are so worthy, it’s glorious even to fail.
data.author: Capt Manoj Kumar Pandey

data.quote: If death strikes before I prove my blood, I swear I’ll kill Death.
data.author: Capt Manoj Kumar Pandey

data.quote: It is God’s duty to forgive the enemies, but it’s our duty to convene a meeting between the two.
data.author: Indian Army

data.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
data.author: Tony Robbins

data.quote: Replace fear of the unknown, with curiosity.
data.author: Dany Gokey

data.quote: Turn your can’t into a can, and your dream into plan!
data.author: Cris Nikolov

data.quote: There are two types of Pain in this world: Pain that hurts you, and Pain that changes you!
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: You laugh at me because I am different; I laugh because you are all the same.
data.author: Daniel Knode

data.quote: You’ve got enemies? Good, that means you stood up for something in your life.
data.author: Eminem
